services.title: Data science
services.description:
Data Science for Online Advertising:

Utilizing data science, we optimize online ads visually. By analyzing market trends and user data, we enhance ad appearance to boost engagement and conversions. As a computer science student, you'll learn to use Python, R, and SQL to manipulate data and create impactful visualizations, preparing you for a tech-driven marketing career

services.title: Full stack
services.description:
Full Stack Development Services:

Our full-stack development services encompass the entire spectrum of web application development, covering both front-end and back-end aspects. From designing intuitive user interfaces and implementing responsive layouts to building robust server-side logic and managing databases, we provide end-to-end solutions tailored to meet your project requirements. Whether you need a dynamic website, a scalable web application, or an e-commerce platform, our expertise in full-stack development ensures seamless integration and optimal performance across all layers of your digital product.

services.title: Networking
services.description:
Networking Services:

Our networking services offer comprehensive solutions to establish, optimize, and secure computer networks. From designing network architectures and configuring hardware devices to implementing protocols and ensuring data integrity, we provide tailored solutions to meet your organization's connectivity needs. Whether you require local area network (LAN) setup, wide area network (WAN) configuration, or network security enhancements, our expertise ensures reliable and efficient network performance. As a computer science student, delving into networking equips you with the skills to design, troubleshoot, and manage complex network infrastructures, paving the way for a career in IT infrastructure management and cybersecurity.

services.title: ML/AI
services.description:
ML/AI Services:

Our ML/AI services harness the power of machine learning and artificial intelligence to drive innovation and insights for your business. From developing predictive models and recommendation systems to automating processes and extracting meaningful patterns from data, we provide tailored solutions to solve complex challenges and unlock opportunities. Our expertise spans various domains, including natural language processing, computer vision, and predictive analytics, enabling us to deliver actionable insights and transformative outcomes. As a computer science student, diving into ML/AI opens doors to exciting career paths in data science, research, and technology innovation, where you can contribute to cutting-edge advancements and drive impactful change.

services.title: VR/AR
services.description:
VR/AR Services:

Our VR/AR services leverage virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) technologies to create immersive and interactive experiences for various applications. From designing virtual environments and developing AR applications to integrating spatial computing and creating 3D content, we offer innovative solutions to engage users and enhance brand experiences. Whether you're looking to showcase products in a virtual showroom, train employees through immersive simulations, or gamify your marketing campaigns, our expertise in VR/AR enables us to bring your ideas to life. As a computer science student, exploring VR/AR opens up opportunities to work at the forefront of technology, pushing the boundaries of digital experiences and shaping the future of human-computer interaction.

services.title: Cloud
services.description:
Cloud Services:

Our cloud services offer scalable and flexible solutions for storage, computing, and application deployment. From migrating on-premises infrastructure to cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud, to optimizing cloud architectures for performance and cost-efficiency, we provide comprehensive support to leverage the full potential of cloud computing. Our expertise includes cloud-native development, containerization, serverless computing, and DevOps practices, ensuring seamless integration and reliable operation of your cloud-based applications and services. As a computer science student, diving into cloud computing equips you with essential skills for modern software development and infrastructure management, opening doors to career opportunities in cloud engineering, solution architecture, and IT management.

aboutpara:
Software Developer with 5+ years of experience in commercial application development. Eager to join Blockchain and Web 3.0 to build innovative and cutting-edge business solutions for the impressive suite of clients within its global reach. In previous roles, slashed downtime by 25% and ensured 98% on-time project completion. Also identified and dealt with a significant process bottleneck that boosted coding efficiency by 35% when resolved.

Currently, I am developing myself in the field of Blockchain and decentralized finance, as well as providing studies in the Cloud, Data, Network, and Fibre industries. First of all, I like to work remotely, of course, full-time roles also make me very happy because, as before, I love teamwork.

Technical skills; Web 3.0/Blockchain | JavaScript | .NET | C# | Python | Django | Flask |Node | React | Vue.js | PHP | Laravel | SQL | Oracle | Cloud (Azure, AWS, Google)

For speaking opportunities, collaborations, events, and business development, please email Yusuf Aras (yusufenessara@gmail.com).
